verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Many valleys ahead to walk through,
Many mountains and hills to be climbed;
In the darkness I cry for the help of the Most High,
I need Thy strength, I need Thy life
To see me through.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Through the test, through the trial,
Through every dark mile, in the depths of despair
I, the Lord, am always there;
In the valley be still and wait, for I shall fill thee
With new strength and new courage
To press on all the way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Many shakings ahead to stand through,
Many breakings and tests to endure.
And though some fall away,
O Lord, keep me in Thy way,
I need Thy strength,
I need Thy life to see me through.
